projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in **React Js**
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: Code-Pen
projects.bodyText:
- A web application that developed in **react js**.
 - In this we use **hook**, **redux**, **state** etc.
 - In this we write **HTML**,**CSS** and **JS** code at run time output

projects.title: Neet Preparation App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that help for Medical Student for Clearing NEET Exam.
 - This application is developed in **Core java** and **firebase** in Android Studio.
 - In this app last 15 year Previous question Paper and important topic  question acc to their chapter.

projects.title: Chat App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that allows users to send texts in real time.
 - Uses **Firebase** database to store texts.
 - User send Friend Request to add user in chat list.

projects.title: Face Detection Music Player
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that play viedo acc to your eye.
 - In this we use third Party libary

projects.title: Feed List App
projects.bodyText:
- An Android App that loads list of feeds from a **paginated** API and shows in a RecyclerView.
 - Uses the **MVVM** architecture.
 - Uses **Paging 3** library along with other Architecture Components.

projects.title: Task Tracker
projects.bodyText:
- A simple Task Tracker web app made with **Angular 12**.
 - Uses **mock JSON server** to get, add, delete or update tasks.

projects.title: Image Encryption/Decryption
projects.bodyText:
- A Web App for Image Encryption and Decryption made in **Django**.
 - Uses **SDES** algorithm for encryption/decryption.
